contents.text: Thank you for calling GenapSys, your Peninsula-based partner in unlocking the molecular world.
For technical support and service inquiries, press 1.
For instrument troubleshooting and diagnostics, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an instrument support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need live assistance troubleshooting an error on my sequencing instrument right now.
I need help diagnosing and repairing my sequencing instrument’s hardware issue.
I need to diagnose a persistent fluidics error on my GenapSys sequencer and recalibrate it.
My sequencer is beeping and won’t start; please help.
My sequencing instrument reports error code 105 during a run; I need troubleshooting assistance.

contents.text: For software support and updates, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our software support team.

navigationGoals: I need to download and install the latest GenapSys software update on my instrument.
I want to troubleshoot my GenapSys software and get the latest updates installed.
I need to install the latest GenapSys control software update and resolve a dependency conflict on my workstation.
I need help updating the instrument software.
I need help updating the GenapSys run-control software to the latest release.

contents.text: For sales and new product information, press 2.
For reagent and accessory orders, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our orders department.

navigationGoals: I want to reorder reagents and accessories for my upcoming sequencing runs.
I'm looking to order reagents and accessory kits for my sequencing runs.
I need to order three additional consumable flow cells and a backup reagent cartridge for my sequencer.
I’d like to reorder reagents and tips.
I'd like to order reagent kits and flow cells for upcoming sequencing experiments.

contents.text: For information on genomic services and custom solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for details and pricing on custom genomic services for my lab’s project.
I’d like information on your custom genomic services and tailored solutions.
I need information on custom targeted resequencing assay design and integrated bioinformatics services.
I want information on custom sequencing services.
I need a quote for custom genomic sequencing services.
